EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Thank you for your email.
In regards to your query, please note that such information cannot be provided by our department as it is unfortunately out of our scope.
Nevertheless, please find below 3 links that will redirect you to IATA web pages where you will be able to access some useful details. Additionally you will find the departments contact details which may be able to provide you further assistance:
http://www.iata.org/services/statistics/Pages/index.aspx http://www.iata.org/services/statistics/intelligence/Pages/index.aspx https://www.iataonline.com/Store/default.htm
For any further assistance on such item, please log a new query through our Customer Portal, www.iata.org/cs. Our Customer Services will be address your query shortly.
Kind Regards,
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
---------------------------- Your message received on {!Case.CreatedDate}:
{!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
